Reviews.Title: “Well located, clean and safe”
Reviews.Author: bigbenbr
Reviews.Content: ive stayed hostal twice highly recommend convenient location price cleanliness friendly staff features theres breakfast nice breakfast 5 euros sanchez nice couple run youll feel home

Reviews.Title: “Very clean, comfortable and safe hostal. Highly recommended.”
Reviews.Author: MeinenPeter
Reviews.Content: arrived door hostal round judge book cover look round greeted extremely friendly hostess welcoming perfectly hostel ensuite immaculately clean cleaned day fresh towels wouldnt normally expect ac little balcony location easy walk metro lots little bars 5 minutes main shopping el corte ingles etc excellent value

HotelInfo.Name: Hostal del Pez Azul
HotelInfo.Address: Pez, 9, 28004 Madrid, Spain
